<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tongue Tether](/Feats.aspx?ID=5709) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tripkee" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=793" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 39 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Snaptongue Tripkee](/Heritages.aspx?ID=363) heritage

</column>

---

Your tongue can momentarily latch on as readily as your hands. So long as you can freely open your mouth, you do not need free hands in order to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383), [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2313), [Reposition](/Actions.aspx?ID=2379), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382). If you have the [Long Tongue](/Feats.aspx?ID=5701) feat, you can Disarm, Grab an Edge, Reposition, and Trip with your tongue at a distance that is 5 feet beyond your normal reach.
name: Tongue Tether
